title: GST cut on electronics: Sony, LG, and Panasonic reduce TV prices by up to Rs 85,000

title: Ba***ds of Bollywood: NHRC seeks action over Ranbir Kapoor e-cigarette scene
content: The National Human Rights Commission (NHRC) has requested the Ministry of Information and Broadcasting and the Mumbai Police to submit an Action Taken Report regarding a complaint against Netflix‚Äôs web series *Ba**ds of Bollywood*. The complaint alleges that a scene featuring Ranbir Kapoor using a banned e-cigarette without health warnings could mislead young viewers and promote vaping.

title: AK-47 celebration: Was there a hidden message? Pak's Sahibzada Farhan reveals
content: Pakistani opener Sahibzada Farhan's AK-47 celebration after reaching his half-century against India has stirred controversy. Farhan defended his spontaneous gesture, stating, "It was just in the moment." Despite his aggressive approach and a quickfire fifty, India secured a strong six-wicket victory. India now leads the Super Fours stage, while Pakistan finds itself at the bottom of the standings.

title: H-1B visa fee hike: Musk recalls his journey, says ‚ÄòI‚Äôm in America via H-1B‚Äô
content: Amidst a significant H-1B visa fee hike in the US, an old post from Elon Musk defending the program has resurfaced. Musk previously credited the H-1B visa for his own success and the growth of companies like SpaceX and Tesla.

title: Delhi Ramleela committee signs Poonam Pandey; BJP, VHP seek replacement
content: The Luv Kush Ramleela Committee's decision to cast Poonam Pandey as Mandodari in their upcoming Ramleela performance has sparked controversy, drawing criticism from the BJP and VHP. These groups are demanding her replacement due to her past controversies and social media presence. While the committee remains open to discussions, they defend their choice, emphasizing that everyone deserves a chance.

title: MHA: NSCN declared unlawful association; ban effective from September 28
content: The Ministry of Home Affairs has declared the National Socialist Council of Nagaland (Khaplang), including all its factions, wings, and front organizations, as an unlawful association for a period of five years, effective from September 28, 2025.

title: H-1B visa hike: ‚ÄòDo not live in fear,‚Äô says Zoho founder to Indians in US
content: Following a massive H-1B visa fee hike by the US, Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu advises Indian tech professionals in America to return to India and rebuild their careers. Drawing parallels with the Partition, he emphasizes India's growing opportunities and the potential for success, suggesting this reverse migration could strengthen India's tech ecosystem.

title: US H-1B visa fee hike: Indian IT firms facing $150-550 million in immigration bill
content: Indian IT companies face rising costs due to a sharp increase in US H-1B visa fees. This could significantly impact their profits. Firms may increase offshoring and local hiring to mitigate the effects. Project timelines could be disrupted. Clients may also bear some of the increased costs. Alternative talent models like remote work may become more common.

title: Delhi riots case: SC notice on Umar Khalid, Sharjeel's bail plea
content: The Supreme Court has deferred a hearing on the bail pleas of Umar Khalid and Sharjeel Imam, who are accused in the 2020 Delhi riots case. Both were denied bail by the Delhi High Court, which cited the gravity of their alleged roles in the conspiracy behind the violence.

title: Why India didn't react to 50% tariff immediately? Rajnath Singh reveals
content: Defence minister Rajnath Singh stated that India didn't immediately retaliate to the US's 50% tariff due to its broad-mindedness. He expressed confidence that Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (PoK) will eventually become part of India without aggressive action, as its residents are demanding freedom. Singh recalled stating five years ago that PoK would itself want to join India.

title: Kelce & Reid: From fiery sideline clash to TV buzz; questions rise over Chiefs duo
content: Kansas City Chiefs faced New York Giants. The game saw a heated argument between coach Andy Reid and Travis Kelce. This happened during the second quarter. The Chiefs had managed only two field goals by halftime. Kelce had only two catches. The team has faced back-to-back losses. Pressure is mounting on the Chiefs to improve.

title: ‚ÄòForced to pay Rs 10,000 bar bill‚Äô: Hyderabad student dies by suicide, uploads video
content: A 19-year-old engineering student in Hyderabad tragically died by suicide, alleging extortion by friends. He claimed they forced him to pay a Rs 10,000 bar bill after a party in Medipally. Police have registered a case of abetment to suicide, extortion, and violation of the SC&ST Act against the suspects, who are currently being sought.

title: Jacqueline Fernandez‚Äôs plea dismissed: SC refuses to intervene in Rs 200 crore case
content: Jacqueline Fernandez faces a setback as the Supreme Court declines to interfere with the money laundering case involving alleged conman Sukesh Chandrasekhar. The court upheld the Delhi High Court's decision to dismiss Fernandez's plea to quash the Enforcement Directorate's proceedings. Fernandez maintains her innocence, claiming false implication in the Rs 200 crore case.

title: 'Bowlers are scared of him': Sehwag praises Sharma's batting after Ind vs Pak
content: Virender Sehwag lauded Abhishek Sharma's explosive batting in India's Asia Cup victory against Pakistan, highlighting his aggressive intent and ability to capitalize on scoring opportunities from the very first ball. Sehwag emphasized Sharma's consistent high strike rate, which instills fear in bowlers and forces them to reconsider their strategies. Sharma's fearless approach has proven instrumental in India's success.

title: Kerala: Man kills wife while she was bathing; goes live on Facebook with confession
content: In Kollam, a tragic incident unfolded as Shalini was allegedly murdered by her husband, Isaac, at their Koothanadi residence near Punalur. Following the gruesome act, Isaac confessed to the crime via a Facebook Live video, citing distrust and accusations of jewellery misappropriation.

title: Usain Bolt to light up football pitch in Mumbai on October 1; fans ecstatic
content: Usain Bolt, the eight-time Olympic gold medalist, world record holder, and global sporting icon will trade his running spikes for football boots in a one-of-a-kind spectacle in Mumbai on October 1. Taking centre stage, the fastest man on earth will light up the pitch in an exclusive football showcase alongside top teams and players, as per a release from PUMA.

title: GST 2.0 is here! What the new tax reforms mean for you - 10 things to know
content: Effective September 22, 2025, the Modi government's GST 2.0 simplifies taxation with two slabs (5% and 18%), benefiting households, businesses, and farmers. Essentials become cheaper, life insurance is GST-free, and healthcare costs decrease. Consumer durables, housing materials, and auto sectors also see reduced GST, boosting affordability and domestic manufacturing.

title: Air India crash: SC questions preliminary report suggesting pilot error
content: The Supreme Court has expressed serious concerns regarding the AAIB preliminary report on the Air India crash, deeming some aspects "irresponsible." Notices were issued to the Centre and DGCA following a plea for an independent probe, highlighting potential conflict-of-interest concerns due to the probe panel's composition and allegations of withheld critical information, including flight data.

title: UP man strangles girlfriend, dumps body in Yamuna; clicks selfie with suitcase
content: Kanpur police have apprehended two men, Suraj and Ashish, for the murder of 20-year-old Akanksha, whose body was allegedly dumped in the Yamuna River. Akanksha, who befriended Suraj on Instagram, was reportedly strangled after a dispute. Suraj confessed, revealing he and Ashish disposed of the body in a suitcase.

title: Gold rate today: Prices hit fresh lifetime highs of Rs 1.11 lakh/10 grams
content: Gold rate today: Gold prices soared to record highs in domestic futures trading, reaching Rs 1.11 lakh per 10 grams, mirroring global trends as investors await US inflation data and Federal Reserve statements. Silver futures also surged, driven by investment flows and industrial demand, with analysts forecasting further price increases. A weaker rupee and geopolitical tensions further supported bullion's rise.

title: Asia Cup scenarios: How Pak can still qualify for final, face India for 3rd time
content: India and Bangladesh have commenced their Super Fours journey in Asia Cup 2025 with victories, India defeated Pakistan by six wickets, fueled by Abhishek Sharma's explosive 74. Bangladesh secured a four-wicket win against Sri Lanka. Pakistan face a must-win situation against Sri Lanka to keep their final hopes alive.

title: India vs Pak: 'Won the battle' - Haris Rauf's wife adds to off-field drama
content: Even as India continued their unbeaten run against Pakistan in the Asia Cup, off-field drama has grabbed headlines. Haris Rauf, who made a jets crashing gesture coupled with a 6-0 sign, has found support from his wife who posted about it on social media. On the field, India had an easy time of beating Pakistan and keeping themselves unbeaten in the tournament.

title: Retired Jamia music teacher rescued, wife found dead; son, 50, trapped alone in flat
content: In a tragic incident in Delhi's Jamia Nagar, police discovered the body of a 65-year-old woman, Aftab Jehan, in her apartment. Her husband, Siraz Khan, 70, was found in critical condition and rushed to AIIMS. Their son, Imran, who has a history of psychiatric illness, was present but unresponsive.

title: Hyderabad cabbie assaults man over cancelled ride, forces victim to touch feet
content: In Hyderabad, a Rapido driver allegedly assaulted a passenger at AIG Hospital after a fare dispute. Balaji, the victim, cancelled the ride when the driver demanded extra money. The driver, along with associates, confronted Balaji, physically assaulted him, and filmed the incident.

title: Akshay Kumar aimed at having Rs 100cr FD, then it was Rs 2000cr - actor reacts
content: Akshay Kumar, often perceived as money-minded, addresses the label, stating he earns honestly and pays his taxes diligently. He recalls his early ambition of accumulating a substantial fixed deposit after being inspired by Jeetendra.

title: Mumbai: Nigerian man killed by flatmates over dispute; attacked with glass bottle
content: A 32-year-old Nigerian man, Lucky Uijeh, was murdered in Nalasopara East on Saturday night, allegedly by his Nigerian friends following an old dispute. The Tulinj police have registered a murder case against the three accused, who resided in the same building as the deceased. Two suspects, Ayoola Barthlome and Oghene Igere, have been arrested, while Odia Peculiar remains at large.

title: India had 'BrahMos' to Pakistan's 'AK47': Ex-PAK spinner on 'maha dhulai'; lauds Abhishek-Gill
content: Danish Kaneria criticized Pakistan's Asia Cup loss to India, highlighting the destructive opening partnership of Abhishek Sharma and Shubman Gill, who made a mockery of Pakistan's 171/5. Kaneria lauded the Indian openers' aggressive counterattack, which left Pakistan's bowlers clueless. He also dismissed Fakhar Zaman's potential complaints about his dismissal, asserting it was a clean catch.

title: 'I have killed my wife': UP man slits wife‚Äôs throat in front of kids
content: In a fit of rage fueled by suspicion, Kishan Sharma murdered his wife, Chanchal, in their Dadri home, slitting her throat in front of their two young children. Following the gruesome act, Kishan himself contacted the police to confess. Authorities arrived to find him beside Chanchal's body, with the traumatized children nearby, confirming his confession and initiating a murder investigation.

title: H-1B alternatives: O1 & L1 visas gain traction; check cost, approval rates
content: Following the surge in H-1B visa fees, legal experts predict a rise in L1 and O1 visa applications, presenting financially viable alternatives. While O1 and L1 visas have stringent eligibility criteria, organizations are expected to steer recruits toward these options.

title: Gracie Hunt shares heartfelt life update with boyfriend Derek Green
content: Gracie Hunt, the Kansas City Chiefs' heiress, shared heartwarming photos on Instagram from a wedding she attended with her boyfriend, Derek Green. The couple, who have known each other since childhood through their families' connection to the Chiefs, looked deeply in love. Hunt expressed her views on love and faith in the post's caption, emphasizing its importance in daily life.

title: AK47 to Jets: How India vs Pakistan fixture had political undertones
content: During the Asia Cup Super 4s match between India and Pakistan, Pakistani players Farhan and Rauf made controversial gestures. Farhan's gun-like bat celebration and Rauf's provocative signal towards Indian fans sparked criticism. Rauf's gesture referenced unverified claims of downing Indian jets, while the match also featured a heated exchange between Rauf and Indian opener Sharma, overshadowing India's victory.

title: New GST rates effective today: Full list of items with updated rates; what is cheaper & dearer?
content: New GST rates 2025 full list effective today: The Modi government's next-generation GST reforms take effect on September 22, 2025, coinciding with the start of Navratri. These reforms reduce tax slabs to 5% and 18%, making household items, cars, and food cheaper. Here is the full list of new item-wise GST rates:

title: Bank holidays in India 2025: Are banks open or closed today? Check full list
content: Indian banks observe closures on RBI-mandated holidays, including Sundays and the second and fourth Saturdays. Today, September 22, banks in Jaipur are closed for Navratra Sthapna.

title: Carry-on or scary-on? You may never know what luggage can hold. Hint - skull
content: A routine security check at Tampa International Airport escalated dramatically when US Customs and Border Protection officers discovered human remains, including a skull and bones, concealed within a passenger's luggage. The traveler claimed the items were for rituals, but authorities seized and destroyed them due to health risks. Prohibited plants and undeclared cigars were also found.

title: Indigo flight delayed over 2 hours after rat spotted on plane at Kanpur airport
content: An Indigo flight from Kanpur to Delhi faced a significant delay of two hours and forty minutes when a rat was spotted in the crew cabin. Consequently, all 172 passengers were deboarded while a search operation was conducted. After the successful capture and removal of the rodent, the flight finally departed for Delhi at approximately 4:50 p.m.

title: Pakistan TV panelist suggests ‚Äòfiring bullets‚Äô to stop India match
content: A Pakistani talk show sparked outrage after a presenter shockingly suggested violence to ensure a win against India in the Asia Cup. This disgraceful discussion overshadowed India's dominant six-wicket victory, highlighted by Abhishek Sharma's explosive innings. The incident adds to a series of controversies, raising concerns about the focus on sportsmanship amidst on-field tensions and provocative celebrations.

title: WNBA playoff schedule: Fever, Lynx take 1-0 leads in semifinals
content: the WNBA semifinals are underway, and the sixth-seeded Indiana Fever made a statement in the opening game . the higher seed will host games 1, 2, 5 and 7 for the first time . it will expand to a best-of-seven series (2-2-1-1-1) .

title: Updated SP+ rankings for all 136 FBS teams
content: Paul Finebaum explains why he's all-in on Miami as a true championship contender . it's a tempo- and opponent-adjusted measure of college football efficiency . if you're lucky or unimpressive in a win, your rating will probably fall .

title: Owner of Raiders, Aces goes pink for Wilson's MVP surprise
content: a'ja Wilson was presented the WNBA MVP trophy with a surprise from her boyfriend . a pair of supporters also showed up for the league's first-ever four-time MVP . the two wore pink wigs in tribute to the pink hair A'ja wore on media day .

title: Latest projections for all 46 postseason CFB games
content: the five highest-ranked conference champions will make the field . the other eight teams will meet in first-round games at the campus sites of seeds Nos. 5 through 8 . this season's national championship game will be played in the new year's six bowls .

title: Best of NFL Week 3's arrivals, featuring Patrick Mahomes' clean suit before 'SNF'
content: the pregame tunnel turned into a red carpet runway in Week 3 . seasoned vets and rookies showed out in looks that ranged from sharp suits to effortless streetwear . the most stylish arrivals from week 3 include quarterback patrick mahomes .

title: Missed opportunities for Arsenal, Manchester City in matchup of title contenders
content: arsenal drew 1-1 with Manchester City at the Emirates Stadium on sunday . erling Haaland's first-half equalizer saw the gunners draw 1-1 . sergio aguero's side had a 2-0 lead at the emirates .

title: Fantasy Football Buzz: Benson will be a top waiver wire priority on Tuesday
content: fantasy football buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around the NFL . second-year player Trey Benson will take over as the Cardinals' presumed every-down back . he managed 5.4 yards per carry with a 19% explosive play rate .

title: 60K club: Aaron Rodgers jumps to sixth all time, Matthew Stafford eyes ninth
content: Aaron Rodgers became the ninth quarterback to throw for 60,000 regular-season passing yards . he threw for 245 yards in the win against the Houston Texans . the los Angeles Rams chose to rest him ahead of their playoff run .

title: AP Week 4 poll reaction: What's next for each Top 25 team
content: the Oklahoma Sooners beat the Auburn Tigers 24-17 in the AP poll . the ranked no. 7 team opened their SEC schedule with a 24-17 win . quarterback will Hammond was exceptional while filling in for an injured behren Morton .

title: Wrestlepalooza grades: Did Rhodes-McIntyre, Cena-Lesnar get above-average marks?
content: the era of WWE Premium Live Events kicked off with Wrestlepalooza from Gainbridge Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . a new women's world champion was crowned as Stephanie Vaquer defeated Iyo Sky in an excellent showdown . the card also featured the return of former WWE Divas Champion AJ Lee .

title: Derrick Henry's next-level stiff-arm: 'If it's against me, I want it to be illegal'
content: Derrick Henry's signature stiff-arm has helped him become one of the NFL's all-time great running backs . when Henry outmuscles Pro Bowl linebackers and defensive backs, it can cause years of embarrassment . if Henry gets one-on-one with a would-be tackler when the Ravens play the Detroit Lions on Monday night (8:15 p.m. ET, ESPN), he will likely unleash his stiff arm .
